comment.author: 83002264@N02
comment._content: The armored cars that make up the column are not Peugeots, Renaults are, specifically the model 1915 (Auto-Mitrailleuse Renault Modelle 1915). Los coches blindados que integran la columna no son Peugeots, son Renaults, concretamente el modelo de 1915 (Auto-mitrailleuse Renault, Modelle 1915). José Luis Castillo armoredcars-ww-one.blogspot.com.es/
